ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchanters definately kick, no doubt about that. At high levels there mana draining spells are a HUGE advantage. (Send pet in- Use stun spell on enemy- Mana
ygData.messageBody:
Enchanters definately kick, no doubt about that. At high levels there mana draining spells are a HUGE advantage. (Send pet in- Use stun spell on enemy- Mana Seive enemy- then blast...) I almost think a enchanter could wipe a necro out with this tactic if the stun allowed him time enough to mana drain.. of course enchanters pet would keep the necro pet occupied... it could all be done in a matter of seconds, by the time the necro was unstunned, a lot of his mana would be gone.. Now im not saying its hands down vs a necro, things would have to go right... but if it worked then the enchanter would have a advantage.

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-



From: kurt walther itzkurt+AEA-wans.net

Jonathan wrote:
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- From: +ACI-Jonathan+ACI- jp1234+AEA-prodigy.net
+AD4APg-
+AD4APg- Actually the 2 best classes for PVP are Cleric and Enchanter at high levels.
+AD4APg- In terms of melee, yes monks by leaps and bounds

Uhm.. Enchanter.. yes. cleric. no. +AD0-) I've seen necros take out
people 7 lvls higher than them. Heh. And this was a lvl 14 necro vs a
lvl 21 cleric. Necros own in pvp. You odn't believe me.. go dual
one. You'll get your ass handed to you. I too thought clerics were
badass pvpers and whatnot. Nope.. I got beat by a necro 3 lvls below
me. Clerics are good.. but enchanters and necros have us beat at higher
lvls.. hands down. Necros dots will kill you with a quickness. I had 5
stacked on me and it took about 30 secs for my life to go from full to
nada. Not a pretty sight. Necros are the shit in pvp. So are
enchanters. Go dual one. It's fun.
